is a primary tool for incremental build of bitcode and
binary files as well. Makefiles for binary files are public, so they may be used for tests running right from the
command line.
Find corresponding makefiles, which are stored in host's project build directory,

. Please note: makefiles
and tests are generated at the same time.
When necessary makefile is found, use the 'cd' command to move from your present directory to makefile's one.
Congratulations! Your tests are run and status is shown in the command line.
